My name is Ilya Barygin, I'm a physicist from Saint Petersburg, Russia, born in 1982. I'm a MOTU (<nowiki>[[IlyaBarygin-MOTUApplication|my application]]</nowiki>).

My Launchpad page is https://launchpad.net/~randomaction, you will find contact information there.

My focus in Ubuntu development is QA. I fix unbuildable or uninstallable packages from time to time. Package I'm keeping an eye on are gnome-commander and claws-mail.
